DOC.detailed_description: This Phase I study assess pharmacokinetics two botanical , Trifolium pratense ( red clover ) Cimicifuga racemosa ( black cohosh ) . Participants receive single dose one botanical preparation . The observation period one week . Drug toxicity , absorption , distribution , metabolism elimination data collect , dosages utilized Phase II clinical trial determine . The Phase II trial examine efficacy red clover black cohosh reduction menopausal symptom healthy menopausal woman . The study randomize , double-blinded , placebo-controlled . Study duration one year .
